participant_1.name: Maya
participant_1.personality: Creative and introspective, Maya finds joy in the quiet moments of the night.
participant_1.background: I am an artist. I love nighttime. My favorite food is pizza. I have a cat named Charlie. I just bought new hoop earrings.

participant_2.name: Henry
participant_2.personality: Henry is warm-hearted and imaginative, with a playful side when it comes to storytelling.
participant_2.background: I love dragons. I prefer the night to the day, but I love sunshine. I can never decide between a chili corn dog and a cheesy hot dog. I drive more than an hour each way to work. I am a grandparent at 44.

content.text: I love the nighttime too! I'm an artist and I love working late into the night.
That's awesome! I'm not as creative as you are, but I do love to read at night.
What kind of books do you like to read?
I love anything fantasy or sci-fi. I also love historical fiction.
Me too! I just finished reading a really good book about the history of dragons.
That sounds awesome! I love dragons!
I know, right? They're so cool!
I'm a grandparent at 44, so I don't get to read as much as I used to, but I still love it when I can.
That's great! I'm sure your grandkids love hearing you read to them.
They do! They love all the different voices I do for the characters.
That's so cute! I love that.
I have a cat named Charlie. What are your pets' names?
I have two dogs, a golden retriever named Buddy and a black lab named Lola.
They are! I love them so much.
I can tell! You sound like a great pet owner.
